hotels.title: Renowned New Zealand Riverside Lodge with Top-Shelf Wine Cellar, Airport Transfers, Daily Gourmet Meals and Aperitifs
hotels.description: Between stunning mountain peaks and the mighty Waikato River stands the ultra-boutique Huka Lodge, one of the world’s most renowned luxury retreats, celebrated by guests including the late Queen Elizabeth II. Heritage Edwardian sophistication, sublime surroundings and vivid Māori cultural flourishes weave together to create an opulent escape unlike anything else - a thorough commitment to outstanding service and a world-class culinary team only further elevate the experience. As twilight lazily unfurls upon Huka Lodge’s flawless gardens, retreat to exquisite suppers backed by New Zealand’s finest local produce and allow the house sommeliers at the sprawling, subterranean wine cellar to curate the perfect vintage tasting as accompaniment.

hotels.title: North Island Lake Taupo Self-Contained Villas with Private Pool
hotels.description: Escape to the shores of New Zealand's pristine Lake Taupo and be treated to a relaxed stay at The Point Villas, an exclusive estate framed by 85 acres of native bushland with sweeping mountain views of Ruapehu, Tongariro, Ngauruhoe and Pihanga from the property. Explore the incredible natural wonders of Lake Taupo located mere moments from your doorstep or admire your surroundings from your luxury, light-filled villa. Each villa offers the feeling of total seclusion by perfectly blending into the surroundings, and has been perfectly crafted to bring the best of the outdoors inside with floor-to-ceiling windows. Step onto the large sun-soaked terrace, dive into your very own private pool, or cook up a storm in your villa's fully equipped kitchen (you can even request the services of a private chef). Spend your days doing as little or as much as you please, and take advantage of the endless ways to fill your day, such as kayaking, swimming, tennis, croquet or bushwalking.
